experience.description: Web and Mobile development: architecture, analysis, implementation. Creating custom web/mobile apps, mainly for hr projects, and also component libraries with sapui5/openui5 technologies and cross web tools such as less, grunt, cordova, oData.

ICI Project - Banco Hipotecario Integration of Kofax 10 y and DocuShare. Creation of custom scripts for OCR in VB.net.
